fields.name: costMalus
javadoc: The additional cost of the path point. If negative, the path point will be sorted out by NodeProcessors.

fields.name: f
javadoc: The total cost of the path containing this path point. Used as sort criteria in PathHeap. Corresponds to the A* f-score.

fields.name: g
javadoc: The total cost of all path points up to this one. Corresponds to the A* g-score.

fields.name: h
javadoc: The estimated cost from this path point to the target. Corresponds to the A* h-score.

fields.name: heapIdx
javadoc: The index in the PathHeap. -1 if not assigned.

methods.name: distanceTo
javadoc: Returns the linear distance to another path point

methods.name: distanceToSqr
javadoc: Returns the squared distance to another path point

methods.name: inOpenSet
javadoc: Returns true if this point has already been assigned to a path
